meanings.definition: A type of enzyme that breaks down proteins in the digestive system.
meanings.sent1: The erepsins in our stomach help us digest the food we eat.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study how erepsins work to understand digestion better.
meanings.sent3: The erepsins in the body are like tiny helpers breaking down the food for us.
meanings.sent4: Her knowledge of erepsins was as sharp as the enzymes themselves.
meanings.sent5: The erepsins worked tirelessly to ensure all proteins were properly broken down.

meanings.sent1: Many erepsins were found in the laboratory samples.
meanings.sent2: The scientists discussed the various erepsins they had discovered.
meanings.sent3: The box contained a collection of colorful erepsins for the experiment.
meanings.sent4: In the field of biology, erepsins are like puzzle pieces waiting to be understood.
meanings.sent5: The classroom display showcased different types of erepsins for the students to learn from.
